message.content:
I need to identify the addition in the amount owed by the entity for goods or services received or purchased on credit during the period.

Looking at the financial statements, I need to find information related to accounts payable or similar liabilities that represent purchases on credit.

From the cash flow statement, I see:
- "Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable: 0.00"

From the balance sheet, I see:
- "Accounts Payable" is 0.00 at both the beginning and end of the period

This indicates that there was no change in accounts payable during this period. It appears the entity did not make any purchases on credit during this time frame, or if they did make purchases on credit, they paid them off entirely within the same period.

Since there is no addition to accounts payable or similar credit accounts, the value would be 0.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '0.00'} }
```
